graph_title: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries and type of flow (e.g. official development assistance, foreign direct investment and other flows)
indicator_name: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries and type of flow (e.g. official development assistance, foreign direct investment and other flows)
target_name: Encourage official development assistance and financial flows, including foreign direct investment, to States where the need is greatest, in particular least developed countries, African countries, small island developing States and landlocked developing countries, in accordance with their national plans and programmes
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 202 KB)
indicator_definition: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries and type of flow comprises of Official Development Assistance (ODA), other official flows (OOF) and private flows.
source_implementation_1: Ministry of National economy of the Republic of Kazakhstan, Ministry of Finance of the Republic of Kazakhstan,  National Bank of the Republic of Kazakhstan
un_custodian_agency: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
